name: electron-typescript-starter
description: A minimal Electron application using typescript

scripts.copy: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/package.json dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && tsc
scripts.pack: npm run build && electron-packager dist/ --out builds --overwrite
scripts.pack-all: npm run build && electron-packager dist/ --all --out builds --overwrite

author: GitHub
